pages.text: One issue you may run into if you use a number of high-consuming Water machines, like $(l:blocks/greenhouse)the Greenhouse,$() is having a lack of Water. You can use a 2x2 pond to get it forever, now wouldn't it be nice to harness that power?

pages.title: Int. Water Generator
pages.text: The $(item)Internal Water Generator$() is used by SHIFT-RIGHT CLICKING on any Tank. Once attached and given one bucket of Water, a Tank will $(6)become bottomless.
